author: abayer
msg: FLUME-229: Flume collector should recover from NN failures
- Retrying decos now handle interrupt while opening, and then after open
- added interruption handling in stubborn append sink (reopening sink)

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-224: SaveConfigCommand saves to flume.master.savefile rather than file specified

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-234: Flume agent node not always closing deleted files
- The core of the problem is that the SeqFileEventSink used for logs (DFO, E2E) did not close file handles it
opened.  This fixes that problem and adds a test that will pass only if file handles are returned.

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-214: Flume should be able to compile/run against non-kerberos hdfs

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-197: Enable flume to write to kerberos protected hdfs clusters
- Simple implementation that requires hadoop + security patches (currently only builds and runs again an internal build)
- Documentation on how to setup principals.
